body.name: 2024 Upgraded W10703867 Dishwasher Heating Element - Replacement for Whirlpool Kitchen-Aid Ken-more Dishwasher - Replacement for AP5809076 W10696509 W10195052 W10329322 W10473250 W10518402 W10687954

features: √√【PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS】:Upgraded Dishwasher heating element W10703867 Adopting upgraded materials, it is not easy to be corroded and ensures better sealing to prevent leakage， engineered to monitor and control the heat of water, and helps dry the dishes at the end of the cycle. Kitchen-aid dishwasher heating element W10703867 using high-quality nickel-chromium alloy materials, kitchen-aid heating element dishwasher AP5809076 W10473250 can withstand high temperatures, generate heat uniformly.

√√【WHAT CAN YOU GET 】: Includes 1 x whirl-pool dishwasher heating element W10703867,2 x composite plastic nuts heater fasteners. Composite plastic nuts is same thread with original, the composite nut can protect the heating element tip from being bent and compressed. If your Dishwasher wouldn't dry dishes during cycle.The dishwasher don’t start or leaks, or the cleaning light blinks on the control panel. Replacing W10703867 Dishwasher Heating Element can effectively solve these problems.

√√【HIGH COMPATIBILITY】: Kitchen-aid heating element dishwasher W10473250 compatible for Jenn Air, Ken-more, Kitchen Aid, Whirl-pool and more dishwasher. Replaces W10195052, W10329322, W10473250, W10518402, W10687954, W10696509, 3280430, AP5809076, PS9494999, EAP9494999, PD00004934, W10703867 etc.If you are not sure if W10696509 dishwasher heating element is suitable for your model, please contact us and we will be happy to solve this problem for you.

√√【730 DAYS GUARANTEE】:Kitchen-aid dishwasher heating element W10703867 is made of premium quality material, supports 730 DAYS return and exchange. We promise to ensure your absolute satisfaction with every purchase.Risk-free shopping.If you have any quality problem during warranty period, please contact customer service in time. We will show you a sincere attitude and satisfactory solution, try our best to solve the problem. Customer satisfaction is our tireless pursuit.

√√【EASY TO INSTALL】: W10696509 Dishwasher Heating element is easy to install. Be sure to disconnect the power and water supply before installation, Remove lower access panel, remove cover from power junction box, remove wire nuts and separate wires.Slide dryer out of under cabinet. Remove electrical connectors from ends of heater coil. Use adjustable wrench to remove plastic nuts from ends of heater coil. The heater coil should be to remove. Reverse dis-assembly for installing new heater coil.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: EASY TO INSTALL Be sure to disconnect the power and water supply before installation, Remove lower access panel, remove cover from power junction box, remove wire nuts and separate wires. Remove water supply line. Slide dryer out of under cabinet so rear can be accessed. Remove electrical connectors from ends of heater coil. Use adjustable wrench to remove plastic nuts from ends of heater coil. The heater coil should be to remove. Reverse disassembly for installing new Kitchen-aid dishwasher heating element W10703867.

PORPDUCT DESCRIPTION W10703867 Dishwasher Heating element engineered to monitor and control the heat of water, and also helps dry the dishes at the end of the cycle. W10703867 can withstand high temperatures and at the same time it can generate heat uniformly . Package include 1 x W10703867 Dishwasher Heater Element，2 x composite plastic nuts heater fasteners . DISHWASHER HEATING ELEMENT W10703867 Kitchen-aid heating element dishwasher AP5809076 using high-quality nickel-chromium alloy materials, it can withstand high temperatures and at the same time it can generate heat uniformly . The filter element is made of high-quality nickel-chromium alloy material, which is durable and not easy to be worn, maximizing the service life of the product.Composite plastic nuts is same thread with original, the composite nut can protect the heating element tip from being bent and compressed. FIXES THE FOLLOWING SYMPTOMS If your dishwasher has problems like it doesn't dry dishes during the cycle, the dishwasher won't start, leaks, or the wash light on the control panel flickers, etc. Replacing and using the whirlpool dishwasher heating element W10703867 can effectively solve these problems. W10703867 Dishwasher Heating element has a longer usage time than other heating elements.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dishwasher was not cleaning or drying
reviews.reviewText: I first tested the old heater element and found it had no conductivity (was bad). I ordered the new one which arrived quickly. I then removed the old and installed the new. It was about a 1/2 hour job.The dishwaher now works perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Will not work - design issue
reviews.reviewText: This heating element will leak every time. There is a design issue with this part. There is absolutely no gasket or sealer between the heating element and the brass nut. This part leaked after 45 mins and what makes it worse is that started to corrode after one partial use. Please not on the photos there is no gasket or sealant between the element and brass nut; the corrosion starting after initial use; the water drops on the INSIDE of the PVC nut since the water is dripping off the wire and inside the nut. This is part cannot work and is a fire hazard. I know this since I have had two electrical connectors already burn on the original part. I was home both times - thank God. This part is for a KitchenAid dishwasher KDFE104HPS, that is almost three years old.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally the problem is solved
reviews.reviewText: We have been struggling to find a solution to our oven not maintaining heat. Here it is!! It’s now good as new and I can actually use the oven again besides Broil. Truly folks, it’s been a year…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Fixed my issue of dishes not drying in kitchen-aid dishwasher. Had to pull out dishwasher to replace but other than that it was easy...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: $75 cheaper than OEM part. Installed in 30 minutes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This heater works fine but one problem: I tgets much too hot, and...
reviews.reviewText: it melts plastic in lower rack. Easy to install, no leaks, looks well made. The problem is that while drying it glows red like an electric oven. From the first time we used it, we had to be sure not to use Heat Dry because it roasts everything. Would be excellent in a oven. We replaced it with an original OEM Whirlpool part to prevent damage to the machine from too much heat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Rusted within a month
reviews.reviewText: This product fit well, and restored our dishwasher to drying well. Unfortunately within a month, the unit is rusted and covering the dishes with a fine rust powder. I'm disappointed:/
